tweet.tweet_content: I sincerely apologize to the people of New Zealand for my stupidity.
Also: they track my cell calls & email, photo my mail and X-ray me, but still have to check my photo ID. C’mon! You guys know me by now!

Trip out on warp drive!
Seems like people of Middle-Eastern descent are treated as expected terrorists.

Thanks for the mention. Didn't know I was getting a free zombie unicorn or a unicorn uprising, but I'm sure both are good.
From my Spam I realized I could learn Mandarin in 10 days, be ripped, triple my credit score & date a woman 1/4th my age without obligation.
It's a sign that I am a completely silly person! Thanks for replying anyway!
I was drivin' down the street taday an' I seen a sign that said, "Your Ad Here." An' I go, "No I'm not. I'm ad HERE."
Do you ever feel that all these emails, tweets, iTunes, calls, blogs, Facebook posts, streaming and on and on are just so much noise?
Bus passengers think only of the destination, the future. The driver is engaged in the trip, the present. We should be more like drivers.
Thanks for the recommendation!
If Hollywood ever runs out of "buzz," not to worry! I'm brewing it in my basement and preserving it in thousands of Mason jars.
If you expect nothing you receive nothing. If you get nothing, you anticipate nothing. What can be changed to disrupt the cycle?

Thanks to entropy, there's a fifteen-second window between scalding and tepid when coffee is drinkable--to some it's always undrinkable.

No more following till I get more followers! I can't lead you to the the Promised Land, but several Suggested Lands are now available!

Some utterly self-involved people have more important places to be than here. Most (utterly self-involved) people have no place to be.

Have you added Robert Klein yet? C'mon! He's Jewish. He's a Comedian. He's great!
Let’s all lower our taxes by promising to create US jobs! You don’t have to mean it & NEVER have to do it. Thanks, Big Tech & Big Pharma!

And thanks for retweeting me!

Thanks for the RTs!
You're very welcome! Glad you enjoyed it!
Thanks for "favoriting" my humble Tweets!
For a profile, I photoshopped myself w/ dolphins, mountaineering, yachting, blowing guitar--but there was always something wrong: me!
Thanks for retweeting!
And people need to overcome their prejudices and focus on what is most important.
True. Many times, people avoid difficult social issues by focusing on their prejudices. We need to go beyond ourselves!
Thanks for the retweet!
Thanks for the RT!
I’ve got it! The problem isn’t that we have too many guns! It’s that we don’t have enough provocation to use them!
Instead of worrying about defining marriage, let’s focus on child pornography, pedophilia, rape, sexual slavery--traditional social toxins.
I don’t want to talk about time-travel. If we start then we’ll be here all day, making diagrams with straws.
In order to curry favor with the Masters, I tattooed my face and body with the names of the best-selling prescription drugs and cola brands.
For my Twitter icon, I tried to post a photo of myself, topless, but learned that people without heads are not very welcome!
No, I'm moving to France!
Strong, contemporary African-American woman transported to antebellum slavery in order to crush her spirit: .
Help! I'm captured by the EYE!
Time cover of 12/24/12, showing baby surrounded by diseases, depicts exactly the negative mind-set that fosters and perpetuates disease.
Respectfully, I think that good may be either illegal or fattening, but BEST is neither--it is pure joy!
If rice dries out a soggy cell phone, what is it doing to the inside of your body?
Fantasy and sci-fi always need new directions. Also, I think we're moving into an era in which genre boundaries are disappearing.
It's all good! Spiritual sci-fi is my thing as well!
For a minute, I thought you wrote that your memoir was set in 1898! As a sci-fi kinda guy, that caught my attention!
Thank you!
You're very welcome!

@TheOolaLife Don't forget "Fancy" (F no. 8)!
I decided today that my only hope is that Angelina and Brad will adopt me. I guess everyone's thought of that!
Anxiety is depression on fire. Both make you not passive-aggressive, but paralyzed-aggressive. We must act, to live; we must live, to act.
¡ Corre! ¡ Corre! ! (Run! Run! !):
El silencio es la única voz de Dios.
What do you call 00, 01, 10, or 11? Two-bit.
I'm happy because I know happiness exists.
Fake blog about show of woman & 4 husbands sparked requests for time & station & outrage when I admitted it was made up! Go satire!
Why live in an illusion?
And an amazing new year!
You're very welcome!

Está bien si tweets hacen triste a veces.
Tonight I can't help thinking about all the children who suffer and die every day in this world.
Pero escribo con mi nariz!
Forget what everyone else told you! HERE’S the way to sell a book!

C'mon! What was Descartes "thinking"?
I think one of the significant instigators of rage and anxiety is our perception that no one really listens to us.
May I express my heartfelt appreciation to you for your rescue squad and ER work!
You've perfectly encapsulated the solution!

Buffy is great! Also Katniss Everdeen, Alice (from Resident Evil), and I have to add Frodo and Bilbo!
It seems like you have to create your own stimulating environment. Or maybe that's just my luck.
Remember what I said before I won the lottery! Naaah!
I guess it's the same as "Where do you get your idess?"
Thanks. I learned a new (i.e, for me) word!
Thank you!
Here's a Christmas song for the 21st century: "Let It Go, Let It Go, Let It Go!"
I think civilization is a disease with good PR. I love the outdoors, but, like Woody Allen: "I am at two with nature."
Thanks for the follow. I didn't know Twitter existed in ancient times (2008)!
Thanks for the follow. Good to know some human beings are still evolving!

Thanks for following. A publican (great word)! Are you then a tavern keeper or tax collector?

Thanks for the follow. From my desk, camping, hiking and birding sound like paradise!
